website_summaries.verdict: Good mix of performance level and price point allows this model to work well as a starter portable tennis machine.
pros: Lightweight machine that's easy to take to your favorite court
Oversized wheels make unit extremely portable
Provides full corner to corner sweeping of shots
Can set ball feed rate and ball exit velocity
cons: Doesn't offer many advanced programming features
No ability to control oscillation of the balls

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: I researched ball machines for a few months before I decided on this one, and I'm so glad I did. It arrived on time, and no assembly necessary. Have used it with my friends who don't even play tennis and they loved it too.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: great machine,
customer_reviews.text: If I were in manufacturer side, I will add a simple on/off remote, that will not cost much from manufacturer. I have used it one month now, excellent machine, excellent service. Very happy to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Dependable machine
customer_reviews.text: Works well when propelling balls straight ahead, but very sloppy with horizontal oscillation! Sends balls in one direction mainly. No equal distribution of balls in both directions-very disappointing! Battery holds charges very well and performs well on full charges for at least an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Tony B.

customer_reviews.title: They really need better quality wheels and the hand hold placement needs to ...
customer_reviews.text: They really need better quality wheels and the hand hold placement needs to be improved. I know I can easily carry 40 pounds, but if I have to spread my arms so wide to grasp it from the bottom, it puts me in awkward position. The pull handle is very flimsy and difficult to snap down. I thought the machine itself performed as expected, been using it for a couple of weeks and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCatherine

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this unit..... ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this unit........spend a little more money and buy a couple levels up!! this one seems to be too cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. Work so well , no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: WISPLIN

customer_reviews.title: Amazon customer service was amazing and replaced it right away
customer_reviews.text: First shipment came damaged and the machine did not work. Amazon customer service was amazing and replaced it right away. Second shipment the battery did not charge, but once I took the control board off I discovered a plug was loose. Once fixed the machine works perfectly and I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the perfect practice tool
customer_reviews.text: excellent tool for newer and experienced players, holds many balls, good battery life, a little awkward to lift into a vehicle
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Already broken twice.
customer_reviews.text: Already broken twice. Tried to open the case and fix the issues by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: charger
customer_reviews.text: Ball machine is great when its working. My charger went bad and Lobster customer service does not answer email or phone.
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: It is a very reliable machine. Once it charged ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a very reliable machine. Once it charged, it can last 2 hours with no problem. The handler is too flimsy wish it can be a little more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Hwang

customer_reviews.title: Lobster is a great machine
customer_reviews.text: Performs exactly how I expected. Takes a bit of experimenting to get the feed rate and side-to-side oscillating in harmony but works nicely once you do. Plus, it nicely throws slow shots appropriate for kids learning eye/hand/racquet coordination and timing so the kids are enjoying more than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: RThomas

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke
customer_reviews.text: First time out and the handle was already broke which is essential for portability. Doesn't look sturdy but hopefully can be fixed. Contacted Lobster immediately after Christmas and the message said they were out until Jan 2?? Was impressed with the machine itself however Its nothing without the handle. Will update with another review to report how they handled it. :(
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great for improving your game and making drills
customer_reviews.text: Great for improving your game and making drills. It works great. You can set up speed, spin, elevation and so on. Battery lasts more than me... (but takes hours for full charging). It's much better than I could imagine before ordering. I really recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andy_FL

customer_reviews.title: Broke - Just a year old
customer_reviews.text: Well, I enjoyed it while it lived, but now it is broken and won't work. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Fuller

customer_reviews.title: We just got lobster, and charged battery to solid ...
customer_reviews.text: We just got lobster, and charged battery to solid green, took it court, on first day, turned it on, played for 30 mins, then battery started flashing green and lobster stopped launching balls. after several attempt gave up. 2nd day, charged battery for 24 hours, solid green, played one round for 10 mins, then again it stopped working. Have called and emailed support, have not heard back today. There were 4 green error lights flashing which indicated rear motor error or control panel error. vendor did not respond adequately, so amazon is replacing machine.
customer_reviews.author: aditya talwar

customer_reviews.title: Don't pay extra for remote control
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, an expensive gadget so expectations are high. The feeder does what it is supposed to do...feed balls continuously. However, I paid the extra cost for a remote control but it has never work well. You have to be standing near the machine (on the same side of net), which defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: cdd853

customer_reviews.title: I love it but it is a pain because it cannit ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it but it is a pain because it cannit be loaded into my Rav unless I take the basket off which cannot be done when full if balls. So, I must put something on the inside to prevent the balls from falling through the hole when i remove it. Should be something that does that.
customer_reviews.author: Xwoman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best tennis machine ever!!! Very reliable and the battery is very good!!
customer_reviews.author: Davy Suryadi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, use it a couple days a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Ball Machine
customer_reviews.text: This ball machine does the job. I really like that it holds a charge for quite some time. My only critique would be that I wish the bin came with a larger option...I added some cardboard around the edges of mine in order to hold more balls!
customer_reviews.author: ladyluv715

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but not $1,200 worth
customer_reviews.text: I had expected, for $1,200, I'd get a bit more. My biggest complaint is that the battery is not removable - I have to bring the entire machine into my home in order to recharge the battery. That's a big inconvenience. Outside of that, the ball machine works well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. Emery

customer_reviews.title: Very good product and great customer service from the manufacture as ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and great customer service from the manufacture as called to speak to someone about what model to buy and he walked me through all the features and benefits of each model so I could make the correct decision for our intended usage.....two minor observations.....the handle to pull it is a little flimsy considering the weight of the product and when the balls become jammed it is difficult to free them due to small openings.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN J HOLAHAN

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just great. A few weeks tranning and you feel the diference... The power of your shots will grow... I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a used machine with the warranty expired off a third party. The elevation stopped working. Talked to Joel at technical support. He walked me through the fix, step by step. Just disconnected and reconnected some wires. Thanks Lobster Sports!!!
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

product_meta.title: Lobster Sports – Elite One Battery Tennis Ball Machine – Corner-to-Corner Sweep – Top & Backspin – 60° Lobs – 4 to 8 Hr Runtime – Charger Included – Easy to Use - 42 lb
product_meta.description: The Lobster Sports elite one battery-operated tennis ball machine is loaded with unique features to help everyone from students to advanced players who are passionate about improving their game The elite one will help perfect groundstrokes, lobs, returns, reaction time, and overall fitness – all at an affordable price. The easy-to-use elite one has elements that are often found in more expensive tennis ball machine models. Users can master forehands and backhands with the full corner-to-corner random oscillation, practice overheads with up to 60-degree lobs – a feature not available on any other competing ball machine, improve reaction time with balls speeds of up to 80 mph, and perfect the ability to return whatever comes their way with the heavy topspin or backspin settings. The elite’s sleek hopper holds 150 balls and the long-lasting, high-capacity, rechargeable battery will supply 4 to 8 hours of court time. Included with the machine is Lobster’s standard dual-voltage charger (100-240v) which has built-in trickle technology to ensure your battery will never overcharge. The charge time ranges from 12 - 24 hours depending on the battery level. Additional power supply options including ac/dc are available from Lobster Sports. Designed for portability, the elite is outfitted with 8 inch, all-terrain wheels to easily travel over any surface and onto the court. The 42 pound, compact design with inverting hopper and folding metal handle makes it easy to transport in any vehicle as well as to store when not in use. Upright the machine measures 29 x 43 x 15. 5 inches. When folded down it is 29 x 21 x 15. 5 inches. Optional accessories including remote control, premium fast charger, external battery pack for extended playtime and storage cover are available from Lobster Sports. Lobster Sports has been making tennis ball machines since 1971 and stands by their products, which are protected by a 2-Year . Engineered to last for many years and to withstand frequent use, Lobster ball machines, just like a car, can last for decades if properly maintained. The Lobster Sports elite ball machine can be a tennis player’s life-long training partner to help significantly improve their game - making it an exceptional value. A 5% restocking fee will be charged for any returned products.
feature_bullets: ADVANCED FEATURES AT AN AFFORDABLE PRICE: The Lobster Sports elite one tennis ball machine is packed with features and built for durability and ease-of-use at an affordable price.
CORNER-TO-CORNER FULL SWEEP: This tennis ball machine features a full corner-to-corner random horizontal oscillation that will challenge a wide range of players, from beginner to more advanced.

FOUR TO EIGHT HOURS OF BATTERY LIFE: Lobster Sports has designed the elite one with a long-lasting, high-capacity battery. A four- to eight-hour battery helps ensure plenty of court time between recharges.
LIGHTWEIGHT AND EASY TO TRANSPORT: Although this ball machine is built to last, it’s incredibly lightweight. Its 42-pound ergonomic design and oversized wheels allow for easy transportation.
EASY TO USE FEATURES: Enjoy playing against advanced features such as up-to-60-degree lobs to practice your overheads – an option not available on any other ball machine.
